About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

Professional Web and Android Developer and programming enthusiast. A keen learner of new skills and technologies. Always up for tech meets and events. To Explore the workings of the functionalities of technology to its root is what he likes the most. A self-motivated team player with excellent communication skills, I envision an exciting future in the industry. Interests and hobbies include: coding/programming, dancing, photography, learning new stuff, open source contributions.
